stories.title: Leading supply-chain company Maersk joins the Open Invention Network
Climate groups say a coding change can reduce Bitcoin energy consumption by 99%

stories.text:
On the web side, I have found Django/Rails/Laravel allow one to get a functional (monolithic) web app up with minimal effort. Avoiding js/spa complexities is part of that (htmx, turbolinks, unpoly).

But what is the equivalent in the mobile app world. How can I write as little js as possible and re-use my mobile friendly monolith in the app store ecosystem?
stories.title: Ask HN: Small business friendly mobile framework?

stories.text:
Just tried Signal for a group, and wow I can't believe that your phone number is shown to everyone in the group. I understand that there is a Signal feature in the pipeline[0], but you currently give strangers your phone number in Signal Groups.

[0] https://www.reddit.com/r/signal/comments/k3dkvd/hide_phone_number_from_group_chat/
